member_quickregistration.repeat_account_password: Répéter le mot de passe du compte

help_welcome.menu: Le menu ci-dessus contient les liens suivants:
help_welcome.menu_me_text: Votre tableau de bord personnel où vous pouvez placer vos favoris.
help_welcome.menu_overview_text: Une vue d'ensemble de toutes les fonctionnalités proposées par la plateforme MIDATA.
help_welcome.menu_config_text: Configure your dashboard and data imports.
help_welcome.menu_research_text: News and announcements about MIDATA, the platform and research projects
help_welcome.menu_consents_text: Gérez les données que vous partagez avec d'autres utilisateurs.
help_welcome.answer_questions: Pour commencer, nous vous recommandons de répondre à quelques questions. Votre compte sera préconfiguré d'après vos réponses.
help_welcome.answered_questions: Thank you for answering the setup questions! You sould visit your dashboard now or change your answers if you need to.
help_welcome.answer_btn: Répondez aux questions de configuration maintenant

help_setup.description: Les réponses aux questions suivantes ne sont utilisées que pour configurer votre compte selon vos besoins.
help_setup.question_measures: Which measures do you want to view in the portal?
help_setup.come_back: Vous pouvez modifier votre configuration en tout temps en consultant la page "Aide".

member_othercircles.empty: Aucun membre MIDATA ne partage des données avec vous.

yourstudies.empty: Vous ne participez à aucune étude.

entercode.title: Rejoignez une étude de recherche en saisissant un code de participation.
entercode.description: Rejoignez une étude en saisissant un code:

providers.name: Nom
providers.empty: Vous n'avez pas enregistré de contact à un professionel de la santé.

member_user.trialuser: Your account is currently a trial account with limited functionality.
member_user.studyparticipant: Your account has been set up for participation in a study. Functionality is limited. You may upgrade your user account to a full account.
member_user.appuser: Your account has been registered by an external application. Functionality is limited. You may upgrade your user account to a full account.
member_user.memberofcooperative: You are a member of the MIDATA cooperative.
member_user.nonmemberuser: You have a full user account but you are no member of the MIDATA cooperative.
member_user.agb_not_requested: By clicking on the 'Request Contract' button the contract and AGB will be sent to you by letter. Please return the signed AGB to convert this trial account into a full account.
member_user.agb_requested: The AGB and contract have been requested by you. Your request has not been processed by the MIDATA office yet.
member_user.agb_printed: The AGB and contract have been requested by you and should arrive during the next days.
member_user.confirmed: Your postal address has been confirmed.
member_user.entercode: The letter sent to you contains a registration code. Please enter your code here once you have received it:
member_user.email_unvalidated: Your eMail address has not been validated yet. Please click on the link of the validation email you received in your email account!
